Module com.ning.breakout
Package com.ning.breakout.controller

Class KeyInputListener

java.lang.Object
com.ning.breakout.controller.KeyInputListener
public class KeyInputListener extends Object
The controller class defines the key event listener for the whole game (designed for all scenes in the game, but only the listener for game board is implemented).
Author:
Ning ZHU - modified

  • Method Details

    • setGameBoard

      public void setGameBoard(GameBoard gameBoard)
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - GameBoard instance used to access/modify the fields of the game board when key event happens.

    • setIsPlaying

      public void setIsPlaying(boolean isPlaying)
      Sets to true only when user plays in the game board.

      User can not open debug console, pause menu and move the paddle if user is not playing in the game board.

      Parameters:
      isPlaying - whether user plays in the game board
